website_summaries.verdict: For a ruffled embroidered look, this is a great option.
pros: The 100% polyester design of this bed skirt makes it thicker and more durable than competitors
Has a 14-inch drop to cover the box spring and comes in two color options
cons: Though the material looks and feels nice, it may fall apart eventually

customer_reviews.title: Love how it looks but came stained
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this looks. It was so hard to make it stay put on the box spring so I stitched up the corners to attach it to the box spring. After I did this I noticed it had a stay in it. Too late to have to remove and return after all that work. It looks awesome with my new quilt. I love that it’s really light.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Pasillas

customer_reviews.title: Stayed Beautiful after Washing
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried after reading some comments about how it changed, got damaged..etc after washing. However, in my case the bed skirt stayed beautiful and intact after washing and drying with proper settings (delicates). It did not shrink or wrinkle either. It is well made and as pictured. The pattern is clean and elegant. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.  Good quality. Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty bed skirt. I put it on right out of the package and it looked great. The fabric is very soft. It’s not exceptionally thick but that helps it to hand so nicely. I wouldn’t call it thin either however. It’s the perfect texture for what I needed. It’s a yellowish cream color ( definitely more cream than ivory) yet it looked great in my neutral toned room. Length was perfect. I honestly wish that I had more beds that needed skirts because I would definitely buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: jodie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for queen bed in guest room. I go round and round with bed ruffles, but was delighted in the quality and appearance considering the price. I missed the fact that the corners were not split to allow for rails connecting a footboard, but the generous amount of material allowed me to cut and seam the splits I needed to make it work. It looks great, and no one would guess it didn't come that way. I've paid more for bed skirts that weren't this pretty. Not just the eyelet, but tiny embroidered design throughout make this a much more expensive and attractive addition to my guest bedroom. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Covers sneaky cats
customer_reviews.text: It's a good store quality dust ruffle for the price. I recommend ironing it prior to putting it on the bed. It does a reasonable job hiding dust bunnies, under bed storage, and sneaky cats. My husband still has not noticed it, so it's not visually intrusive either. Good deal. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Robinabobina

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my guest bedroom, so, for the price, I wasn't expecting a high-end product....but I did expect it to last longer than 2 weeks. While changing the bedding after the first use, I noticed that about 18" of the ruffle was completely detached from the base .....cannot be repaired as the edge of the ruffle is so frayed that it cannot be reattached to the base without significant change in the length of the ruffle. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Looks very pretty, fit my daughter’s full size bed perfect. Pleasantly surprised since the reviews were not the greatest, mine was perfect. It was wrinkled right out of package as expected so I tossed it in the dryer on low with a damp washcloth and wrinkles came right out. Not the highest quality but worth the $25.
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: I always did the very tailored bed skirts but was finding they always slid down and never ended up looking very good. I bought this one to try one with more ruffles and really love it. The eyelets add a lot of interest and overall, this bed skirt is a real show stopper. It doesn't slide or scrunch up. It was the perfect length. This is a true and honest review. I was NOT reimbursed for a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Material that melts
customer_reviews.text: Naturally, the dust ruffle was quite wrinkled coming out of the package. When I took an iron to the ruffle, on moderate heat, the wrinkles were ironed out. BUT, when I barely touched the fabric holding the dust ruffle in the shape of the bed, it totally melted in the blink of an eye. That caused me two time consuming patch repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Donna in Delaware

customer_reviews.title: Do not iron the center only the part that hangs down.
customer_reviews.text: We moved from a queen to a king. I bought this for our new king bed and it is almost the same as the one I bought for our queen 5 years ago at Macy’s for 3x’s the price. I did not wash it before I put it on the bed but did iron it but not the middle because I am sure it would melt with the heat.
customer_reviews.author: linnea neuendorf

customer_reviews.title: Good fabric!
customer_reviews.text: This dust ruffle was just what I wanted! Nice, soft cotton fabric...nothing cheap about it, except the price. I rinsed it and dried it on gentle and ironed it to get it perfect. It has that synthetic stuff next to the box springs so make sure the iron doesn't get on that part or it would melt.
customer_reviews.author: jabrnbsn

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bedskirt for the Price
customer_reviews.text: For the money, very nice bedskirt. Liked the style of the eyelets. Material soft and lays very nice. A word of caution, but bedskirts now have the sheer top you lay over the mattress. Gone is the day when the whole skirt was a nice cloth material. If you wash on gentle and dry on low, should not have a problem. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lizanne

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Fresh Ideas Bedding EYELET RUFFLED BED SKIRT Classic 14” DROP LENGTH Gathered Styling, QUEEN White. I ordered a Queen size. When it arrived the original packaging read Queen size. The bed skirt is not Queen size it was more like a small Full size, if that. I was so upset because I struggled to remove a very heavy Queen mattress by myself in order to put on the bed skirt; only to realize it was too small. I am so disappointed. The stitching was very nice, sad it did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chary Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. As described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. As described. Good quality. Better price. Same bedskirt price was $60+ at other places. Material that sits under mattress is some kind of synthetic but it really doesn't matter because no one sees it. Purchased off-white. The gathered bedskirt works well with quilts that tend to be flat (compared with comforters). Good contrast in texture. Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Costume Whimsy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these. I Was very disappointed with the platform fabric. Cheap, thin, one had a hole in it. I ironed the ruffle bc it was very wrinkled and the platform fabric melted when the tip of the iron touched it. I could have returned both but wasn't worth the trouble. Obviously I wouldn't buy again..
customer_reviews.author: Outstander

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take long at all for the hanging material to rip away from the material that holds it up that is sandwiched between the box springs and top mattress. The material is a little thin but still looks OK except where the tears are very obvious. I've had it 2 or 3 years but it probably ripped in the first couple of months. The drop is also about 1 or 2 inches short. I have a standard bed frame and a standard box spring.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I'd hoped for -
customer_reviews.text: The queen comforter set I purchased didn't cover the bottom of the bed; but this bedskirt is exactly what I'd hoped it would be and it looks perfect with the comforter set. It was easy to put on the bed and is the perfect length. The gathering styling makes the ruffle lay perfectly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Critic

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bed skirt!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bed skirt. Fresh, feminine, and fits my bed perfectly. Not true like some people say about it being flimsy. Not at all! It has a nice cottony fabric and is quite substantial enough. And I only found a couple of dangling threads to clip off. I think some people just like to be negative rather than look at the true value of something. I looked far and wide for the perfect bed skirt to go with my Laura Ashley bedspread, and this was it.
customer_reviews.author: California lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a “used” one for only $18 - it’s an incredible value! It looks stunning in my spare bedroom on my King Bed. See photo. I highly recommend. I took it straight out of the package and put it on the box spring: didn’t wash or iron. No issues at all! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but short in the width for Queen
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, fits a little short on the width - like an inch on each side of a queen boxspring. It’s a shorter length (14”) which is what I needed but because the width is not wide enough to provide a good fit, the ruffle hangs a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: this is way more affordable and easy to apply for my bed sidings. If you would purchase this type of product in malls or stores they come with the whole covering for your bed but it is inessential ,this type of product is the best .
customer_reviews.author: Elrom

customer_reviews.title: Nice but problematic
customer_reviews.text: The dust cover looked very nice on bed but due to slippery base that goes under mattress I felt like I was sleeping on a surfboard in the ocean. It would slip my mattress 2 to 3 inches nitely no matter how I tried to make it stay.
customer_reviews.author: mindcrone

customer_reviews.title: Looks good holds shape on bed
customer_reviews.text: Antique 3/4 bed & this fits good in double bed size. Holds shape & completely covers mattress support( springs if you have them), not just a ruffles around the bed edge. Looks good on Eastlake antique bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Ordered two and one already ripped at the seam.
customer_reviews.author: msgrump

customer_reviews.title: Fit the bill
customer_reviews.text: My mother was looking for exactly this type and size of bedskirt, and couldn't find it anywhere. She is most pleased with it, and, not only did it fit the bill, it was fairly inexpensive. She's smiling!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but falls apart
customer_reviews.text: While this is adorable, within 3 months of using, I started noticing rips and tears in the fabric. These pictures were taken after 5 months of use. As you can see from the pictures, the rips do not line up with the edge of the bed rails, so it’s not like they were getting constantly rubbed or worn. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this bed skirt. Fits full size bed and I didn't have to mess around trying to get corners to fit. Popped it in dryer on air to fluff out wrinkles. Makes bed look so much prettier and my underbed storage boxes don't show! Arrived quickly . Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: C. Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: High quality bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: We've had the bed skirt for a few months now and couldn't be happier with it. The material is very nice and the part that goes between the bed is much heavier than many we tried (and returned). It stays in place really well and looks wonderful with all of our duvet covers.
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Quality Material; Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This dust ruffle is quite attractive (white) and of good material. It was quite easy to install between the mattress and box spring. And, unlike other brands I have tried, this one stays put. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: I have a queen mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the full size as the queen I already have keeps slipping from side to side and drags on the floor. The full is a tiny bit short on one side but it stays in place better and isn't so short that it looks funny. It actually fits better than the queen. Judy T
customer_reviews.author: JUDY T

customer_reviews.title: This does not look like it cost less than 13 bucks
customer_reviews.text: This does not look like it cost less than 13 bucks! It's very pretty and fresh looking. I sew and would favorably compare this eyelet to the eyelet fabric at Joann's. It's nice! I haven't installed in on the bed at my cabin yet but I am very impressed with it out of the box. Would be great in a girl's bedroom and nice enough quality to for an adult's bed too.
customer_reviews.author: alaskan

customer_reviews.title: Wet bed skirt not happy
customer_reviews.text: The bed skirt is soak and wet . Not the outside envelope . When I opened up the plastic vase it was in the bed skirt is absolutely soaked . I do not want another one . I am grossed out and would like a refund . Thank you I am not happy about the time it is taking to get a response
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bedskirt. It came earlier today. I threw it in the dryer for a little while to loosen up the packing wrinkles. I didn't get back to it until 6 hrs later. It came out of the dryer and it was ready to go. I put a safety pin in each corner to hold it to box springs and VOILA! Better than I expected. Its so cute, it just makes me smile 😃 I'd buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: This bedskirt while very pretty is made of cheap materials. The part of the skirt that lays on the box is the problem. The first time in the dryer and it began to melt and fuse, drawing up in that area. If you try to pull the skirt to even it up after the mattress is laid down, that layer tears! Just awful! I am so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very poor. Learned a lesson not to buy from this ...
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this, it was listed as twin/full which I note has since been changed to full. When I was ready to use it, I noticed that it was marked as a full. It was too late to be returned. The positive is that it was an inexpensive item (even for two). The quality is comparable to the price..........very poor. Learned a lesson not to buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty bedskirt, perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved eyelet, and my previous bed skirt was the wrong size. After I carefully measured and knew I needed the 14" drop, I ordered this one. It looks so fresh and lovely!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Star

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just put this on yesterday for my Spring update. Looks great, easy to put on. Looks like skirts I have purchased for twice the amount! Will definitely get one for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  bed  skirt
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed skirt. Needs ironing when taken out of the package before you can use it but it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy  C

customer_reviews.title: really cute on the bed
customer_reviews.text: I like it as it does not hand on the floor. but it does look cheaply made. I haven't washed it yet. I am a little concerned as we have a little dog who likes to hide under the bed, so I know eventually this will go through a standard, not gently wash. I will let you know how it holds up. Guess you could sew it onto an old sheet. It's the middle part that I am concerned about. I think the ruffle itself will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paradise

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Even though this product was not the cotton version I had wanted the poly mixed version actually is nice works. Less wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: flames

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This pretty white eyelet bedskirt fits my daughter's full size bed perfectly, and is exactly what we wanted. It really blows my mind when people order the wrong item, and then give it a bad review. It is obvious in the photograph that this bed skirt does not have split corners. If you have a footboard on your bed, you will need a bed skirt with split corners, or you will need some minor sewing skills to do it yourself. It is beautiful, and appears to be well made. It also has a 3 year warranty, so I'm not sure how you can go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice eyelet bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: This looks quite pretty. I decided to purchase a farmhouse bedspread which has a 30" drop skirt instead of this eyelet bedskirt.
customer_reviews.author: Poma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fabric
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised at how pretty the fabric is! Great value as I’ve made bed skirts before....no way could I have made these (twin) for what I paid....very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa N. Custis

customer_reviews.title: Item is not quality depicted in picture.
customer_reviews.text: The picture posted looks as if it is a high thread count quality, but it is NOT at all. The real item is not near the quality I expected as it looks in the picture. The real item is thin and somewhat sheer, an obviously lower thread count than depicted. The actual quality is a $6.99 value, not $20.00.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Very pretty. I have an extra deep Queen mattress set and the bed skirt comes about 5 inches from the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Trica

customer_reviews.title: Happy finishing look.
customer_reviews.text: My bed and bedroom needed a touch of something to add softness but not be interfering with the decor. This little, simple ruffle is perfect for my needs. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: winifred anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is made of a nice material about a medium weight fabric and super cute. I used it on my grand daughters queen bed. Of course, had to iron the ruffle out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: hawaiigirl

customer_reviews.title: French Country
customer_reviews.text: Not as long as I hoped but it worked well because I layered it over a lilac bed skirt and it looked gorgeous. Very French Country look.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: The quality is ok. I would have reviewed higher but it’s really big and the lining hangs down further then It should. I got a queen but it’s a good 3-4 inches bigger then it should be I think so the lining is visible.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle726

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: For the bedroom of my daughter and I think it goes very well with her quilt that also has lace although I think I'm a little long but I really like how it looks I think you make a very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Maria c.

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the same fabric and embroidery as the pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the bed skirt and the pillow cases because they’re portrayed together in the pictures, but they’re taken from afar on purpose it seems, because they’re not the same and the bedskirt doesn’t have the ruffles like the pillow does. It has a shiny, cheap embroidery and I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.author: Afro Dritë

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, but yellow stain ruined it for me...
customer_reviews.text: I received this in an unopened package but there was a 4-inch long yellow stain that I couldn't wash out with detergent. Product needs to be reviewed more carefully when being packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L You

customer_reviews.title: Great bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality bed skirt. I am very pleased with the quality of the fabric and it fits to size.
customer_reviews.author: Rhode Island shopper

customer_reviews.title: So perfect that....
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even noticed it exists since I put it on my bed. To me, that is wonderful because I am sick to death of having to deal with my bed skirt every time I want to vacuum. This one fits perfectly on my king size bed, and hangs perfectly and IS perfect. Put it on and forget it, like I did.
customer_reviews.author: boyschool

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The lace portion of this bedskirt is pretty although not expensive looking. Bright white color. Be careful washing this as the top portion is not durable. Paper thin literally.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Hide the messy storage under my bed!
customer_reviews.text: I got the ivory white and it fits any colors of my bedding. It has a great lace looking and covers the storage space under the bed frame. I am happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chih-Yun Tao

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have any slits on the corners so it doesn't work with my bed frame at all. Bought it "used" it said it was in good condition but has red or pink stains on the back side.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: For close to $20 this is the best thing you can do for your bedroom. Well, I have a tiny bedroom with a queen bed and it really just makes everything look lovely. Even if the room gets messy it still has a sweet homey feel because of it. It was really easy to put on and the ivory color is just what it should be. Not yellowy or anything. You won't regret buying this if you're trying to pretty up a room for cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Jalalila

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Material is beautiful, I love it! Looks fabulous on my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Did not look like it was in new condition
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what went wrong here, but there was red markings all over the white bedskirt. Clearly I can't use it since it's white and the marking are so obvious. Did not look like it was in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Great bedskirt, looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because I had to cut the bedskirt at the corners in order for it to slide over the bedframe. But to be fair, it looks exactly like the picture, so if you don't have a footboard this will not be an issue. Other than that, it is super cute and looks great in my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kalb

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty indeed, but the off-white color is still too ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty indeed, but the off-white color is still too light for the bed quilt -- not really a fault of the product. I am getting used to it. It could be an inch longer, too -- but the box spring might be a little thicker than others. Really, the product deserves five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Is an ok product
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice product, good quality. I recommend, the only problem it’s a kind small, should be a little big..
customer_reviews.author: Lindibele

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and stained
customer_reviews.text: Very Cheaply made you can read the tag through the plasticity hopefully it will hold up to washing because it came spotted with odd little orange rusty stains right out of the package . Not worth the money :(
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bed skirt
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality bed skirt. Fit very true to size and seems to be decent fabric. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: tiger76

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate luck it seems...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed skirt. I just wish I could get one that doesn’t have a tear in the eyelet. The first one came with a tear in the eyelet and I just opened the replacement and it also has a tear in the eyelet. Everything else about it seems to be great. It’s the perfect height for my bed, and absolutely the style I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tsa Ming

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed skirt.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this skirt for our guest room because we put our old mattress on a simple frame I built that was not attractive. The skirt fit great and hangs to the floor, the frame is 14-inches tall. We like this style of bedding and love the way it looks in our guest room. The skirt arrived pretty quick and is in great condition. The material and construction quality is very good too.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome !
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom and couldn't have asked for better quality and price!! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Tgfoster

customer_reviews.title: Looks crisp and fresh
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for and at a most affordable price. The eyelet material looks fresh and crisp and gives the bed the look of spring in the country. The fabric that lies under the mattress looks a bit thin so I'm unsure how it will look after several washings but for now, I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: WORST QUALITY EVER
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this product can be sold on Amazon. I didn’t even open up the whole bedskirt when I discovered so many sewing mishaps and loose threading. If it’s just that it’s loose, I can cut it off, but there are sewn parts that are completely mangled. Whoever makes these products should be ashamed of themselves.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is thin
customer_reviews.text: Fit our bed, looks good, but fabric is fairly thin. Good value tho.
customer_reviews.author: huladays

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. First bedskirt arrived with large cut in the side. Return and replace was immediate.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Dodge-Ha

customer_reviews.title: Great bedskirt!
customer_reviews.text: Super! Love this bed skirt and the size is perfect! Make sure you order the right drop size!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: She loves how pretty the eyelet ruffles are
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom. She loves how pretty the eyelet ruffles are. She says the quality is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Like it. Nikki
customer_reviews.text: This looks really good and coordinates well with my comforter. Like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: gloria figg

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty & No Slip.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bedskirt but has a hard time putting it on by myself. It firs over the bottom mattress and doesn't slip. I matches all of my different bed coverings so I never have to change it.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely material and hangs nicely on high sleigh bed!
customer_reviews.text: Material is very soft and looks really nice on my sleigh bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: The bottom is not good quality. Like tissue paper
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this- the skirt is very nice but the bottom is made out of tissue paper. If you iron & it touches the bottom it will melt. I only got it because a lady said the bottom was made out of a material which is not correct. Will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Some threads.
customer_reviews.text: After a year and many washings, there are some threads coming off of this. However very pretty, dainty and does the job. UPDATE: the material that is underneath the bed started to rip away. I tried to sew it but the material rips so easily because it is so brittle.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected so I improvised
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut it in half to fit our queen sized bed. It kept slipping.
customer_reviews.author: gerry f

customer_reviews.title: Not great for beds with foot boards
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. I wish this bed skirt had slits at the corners as our beds have footboard so it doesn't fit well at the corners. I will have to add slits to them to get them to fit right. Other than that, really sweet looking with their shabby chic decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It's smaller than size
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this product because it was too small for my bed. Also when washed the flat part was thin and papery
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kipple

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: Probably my fault, the bed skirt itself is a nice quality but the fabric that goes under the mattress is a poor quality. It can tear easily and is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and looks great. It finishes off the look of the bed when it's made up. It really is just what I was looking for. It washes up quite nice and is offered at a good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: GraceSlick17

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find this. Most have an elastic band to adjust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bedskirt is top quality and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant buying bedding without actually seeing it and feeling it. However this bed skirt is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: SO cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! so easy to put on and clean and the patterns are beautiful. Will be buying some for my daughters rooms
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT will do.
customer_reviews.text: This is just Okay. I wish the corners were split, because it needs to go over wooden corners on the old rope bed. The material is okay, but a little thin. Still, it works and it's pretty enough.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Woodhouse

customer_reviews.title: Ok once clean but arrived dirty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dirty, which was odd since it was all in its package ok, most of the spots cleaned off with spot cleaning and now after some ironing it looks good, just be prepared.
customer_reviews.author: ErHo

customer_reviews.title: Great bedskirt
customer_reviews.text: Great bedskirt. Got the matching shams and they look really cute together. Reminds me of what I had when I was a little girl. Very nice and well made. I included a pic, but keep in mind I did not iron it so I'm kind of just letting the wrinkles fall naturally
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice and is good enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and is good enough for the price. Unfortunately it ripped as I was straightening it out- the very first time I used it. I was able to stitch it back together (and the rip is covered by the mattress) but a brand new product shouldn't rip straight out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: M.Pag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: All edges aligned and length just above the floor. A beautiful finish. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: s. tucci

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: couldn't wait to get this in the mail. I ironed all the material and put it on the bed, using the screw pins I also bought so it would not move on the bed frame. It is a little short, about 1 1/2 inches from the floor for my bed, but that is because I have the legs up on a 2X4 to raise my bed up higher :) It is well made and love it with the rest of my bedding.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: Well it's pretty, I'll give it that. But upon adjusting it, it ripped at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Zero complaints, great product
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, looks good, easy to install, hides my ugly box spring, stays in place, and keeps dust from building up under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Stevil

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I looked at Wayfair and numerous sites trying to find a great price for frilly bed skirts without paying an arm and a leg for them. This ended up being what I chose because the price was great, but it was the design I liked most. They fit the two twin-beds that are tall (14+ high) terrifically and don't move around.
customer_reviews.author: Momandmore

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous for my queen bed. Thin material- the center tore during installation, but happy for the price and obviously my mattress covers the tear that occurred. I would worry about washing if it needed it.
customer_reviews.author: MK Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. I bought this last December and didn't open it until today when putting together my daughters room. It is literally 6 inches too short for the bed, the inner fabric is flimsy netting. I wish I could return it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and lovely details.
customer_reviews.text: This bed skirt is lovely. The quality is wonderful and the little eyelet lace detail is very unique. I bought it for my parents' new bed and it looks wonderful under their mattress. Makes their whole room look great.
customer_reviews.author: ItsAMeKristigi

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful eyelet lace, sturdy material and good strong seams, fast delivery. What more could you ask for? 💕
customer_reviews.author: Martha Susan McKeehan

product_meta.title: Fresh Ideas Bedding Eyelet Ruffled Bedskirt Classic 14” drop length Gathered Styling, Full, White
product_meta.description: Size:Full| Color:WhiteFresh Ideas Bedding brings you elegant Bed Skirts at an affordable price! Fresh Ideas Eyelet Ruffled Bed Skirts are made from a 100% polyester microfiber for beautifully smooth draping. Featuring a traditional white platform and a 14-inch drop around the bottom of the bedframe, this bedskirt creates a “finished-bed” look. Fabric is pre-shrunk and colorfast for longevity and shape retention. Complementary matching pillow shams are also available. These eyelet ruffled bedskirts and shams are designed to coordinate with other bedding products such as comforters, duvet covers, flat sheets, fitted sheets, and pillowcases. Pair with Fresh Ideas Eyelet Ruffled Pillow Shams. • Soft luxury bedding at an affordable price. • 14-inch drop to cover boxspring, bed frame and legs. • Generous eyelet ruffled styling for a classic refined look. • Delicately tailored in easy-care fabric. • Fade-resistant and shrink-resistant. • Machine wash on cold, Tumble dry on low.
feature_bullets: White ruffle bed skirt sewn with Schiffli Eyelet embroidered trim for smooth, colorfast draping.
Mitered corners and a sturdy platform hold bed valance in place so it won't shift or sag over time.
Delightful ruffled design features gathered ruffles around 3 sides of bed for a classic, beautiful look.
Long bed skirt has 14" drop length to completely hide box spring, bed frame and bed legs.
Fabric is pre-shrunk, colorfast, and wrinkle-resistant for optimal longevity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,763 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Satisfaction guaranteed, or return to us within 3 years with purchase receipt for full refund.
